links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,-10,10,-5,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[-((z - 1)*z*((z - 1)*z + 4) + 1)/(z - 1)^5, {z, 0, 100}], z] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 16 2011 *)Table[Binomial[n,0]-Binomial[n,2]+Binomial[n,4],{n,0,50}] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{5,-10,10,-5,1},{1,1,0,-2,-4},50] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 02 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) { for (n = 0, 200, write("b058923.txt", n, " ", 1 - binomial(n,2) + binomial(n,4)); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 24 2009(PARI) Vec(-(1-4*x-2*x^3+x^4+5*x^2)/(x-1)^5 + O(x^60)) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 03 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 12 2001
